text: @SenSchumer Oh, Chucky. You're wrong yet again. There's been ONLY 59 reported cases of the Coronavirus in the entire US and NO deaths! No one is hiding anything. It's you damn Democrat's lies that's causing people to panic. You're hatred for Trump is why you're bitching. Knock it off!!

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
